FS.sqlQuery: select "GLAccount" from DSC1 where "BankCode" = $["@EXD_OMCB"."U_COD_BANCO"] and "Branch" = $["@EXD_MCB1"."U_COD_EMPRESA"] and "Account" = $["@EXD_MCB1"."U_DES_CUENTA"]
